name: Fire Elemental
damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.name: Fire Form
specialTraits.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire.

specialTraits.name: Illumination
specialTraits.description: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

specialTraits.name: Water Susceptibility
specialTraits.description: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites.

name: Water Elemental
damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.name: Water Form
specialTraits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

specialTraits.name: Freeze
specialTraits.description: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

savingThrow.effect: takes 13 (2d8+4) bludgeoning damage and is grappled (if Large or smaller)
